title: PowBlocks
author: PowBlocks
content: 🚀 Introducing BlockFeed's Exciting Points System & Affiliate Rewards! 🌟Get ready to turn your engagement into rewards on BlockFeed, powered by PowBlocks! We're thrilled to announce our new points system, designed to make your BlockFeed experience even more rewarding. 100 points equal to 1 XPB.Here's How You Can Earn Points:📝 Create a New Post: Earn 10 points for each new post you create.👀 Post Views: Get 0.001 points for each view your post receives.💬 Comment on Posts: Earn 5 points for every comment you make.👍 React to Posts: Receive 2 points for reacting to any post.🤝 Gain Followers: Get 2 points for each new follower.🤖 Referral Bonus: Earn 2 points for every user you refer.(Daily limit: 10,000 points)But that's not all!We're also launching an Affiliate System: Earn 1 XPB for every new member you refer to BlockFeed.Remember, these amazing opportunities are available for a limited time only. So, start posting, engaging, and referring to rack up those points and XPBs!Join the fun and start earning today: https://blockfeed.org/
